document.full_text: the new york state legislature on thursday passed a $132.5 billion spending plan, closing a $10 billion deficit with no new taxes or debt and instead relying on harsh cuts to education and healthcare.
document.title: ny legislature passes $132 billion budget, no new taxes
lines_and_colors: the new york state legislature on thursday passed a $132.5 billion spending plan, closing a $10 billion deficit with no new taxes or debt and instead relying on harsh cuts to education and healthcare.
